bill.title: Employment Security; Unemployment Insurance Contribution Rate Schedule; Unemployment Compensation Fund
bill.description: Increases employer contribution rates to the state unemployment compensation fund. Effective 01/01/13. (SD1)

history.action: (H) Pending introduction.
(H) Introduced and Pass First Reading.
(H) Referred to LAB, FIN, referral sheet 6
(H) Bill scheduled to be heard by LAB on Tuesday, 01-31-12 9:00AM in House conference room 309.

(H) The committees on LAB recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 12 Ayes: Representative(s) Rhoads, Yamashita, Aquino, Cullen, Ichiyama, M. Lee, Luke, Saiki, Souki, Takumi, Fontaine, Johanson; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) Okamura.
(H) Reported from LAB (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 92-12) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to FIN.

(H) Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 1 and referred to the committee(s) on FIN with Representative(s) Ching, Fontaine, Johanson, Marumoto, Pine, Thielen voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) McKelvey, Takai excused (2).
(H) Bill scheduled to be heard by FIN on Tuesday, 02-28-12 4:00PM in House conference room 308.
(H) Broadcast of hearing/briefing available. See: www.capitoltv.org

(H) The committees on FIN recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 17 Ayes: Representative(s) Oshiro, M. Lee, Choy, Cullen, Giugni, Har, Hashem, Ichiyama, Jordan, Kawakami, C. Lee, Morikawa, Tokioka, Yamashita, Riviere, Ward; Ayes with reservations: Representative(s) Marumoto; Noes: none; and Excused: none.
(H) Reported from FIN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 953-12) as amended in HD 2, recommending passage on Third Reading.
(H) Forty-eight (48) hours notice Tuesday, 03-06-12.
(H) Passed Third Reading as amended in HD 2 with Representative(s) Fontaine voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and none excused (0). Transmitted to Senate.
(S) Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 162).
(S) Passed First Reading.
(S) Referred to JDL, WAM.
(S) The committee(s) on JDL has scheduled a public hearing on 03-19-12 10:00AM in conference room 016.

(S) The committee(s) on JDL recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in JDL were as follows: 2 Aye(s): Senator(s) Hee, Shimabukuro; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 1 No(es): Senator(s) Slom; and 2 Excused: Senator(s) Gabbard, Ihara.
(S) Reported from JDL (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 3005) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referral to WAM.
(S) Report adopted; Passed Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referred to WAM.
(S) The committee(s) on WAM will hold a public decision making on 03-29-12 9:00AM in conference room 211.
(S) The committee(s) on WAM deferred the measure until 04-02-12 10:35AM in conference room 211.
(S) The committee(s) on WAM deferred the measure until 04-03-12 10:00AM in conference room 211.

(S) The committee(s) on WAM recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes in WAM were as follows: 11 Aye(s): Senator(s) Ige, Kidani, Dela Cruz, English, Espero, Fukunaga, Kahele, Kouchi, Tokuda, Wakai; Aye(s) with reservations: Senator(s) Ryan ; 1 No(es): Senator(s) Slom; and 2 Excused: Senator(s) Chun Oakland, Kim.
(S) Reported from WAM (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 3337) with recommendation of passage on Third Reading.
(S) One Day Notice 04-10-12.
(S) Report adopted; Passed Third Reading. Ayes, 24; Aye(s) with reservations: none . Noes, 1 (Senator(s) Slom). Excused, 0 (none). Transmitted to House.
(H) Returned from Senate (Sen. Com. No. 591) in amended form (SD 1).
(H) House disagrees with Senate amendment (s).
(S) Received notice of disagreement (Hse. Com. No. 547).
(S) Senate Conferees appointed: Hee, Chair; Kidani, Co-Chair(s); Shimabukuro.
(H) Received notice of Senate conferees (Sen. Com. No. 758).
(H) Reconsideration of action taken on 04-12-12.
(S) Received notice of House reconsideration of action in disagreeing to the amendments proposed by the Senate (Hse. Com. No. 642).
(H) House agrees to Senate amendment(s).

(H) Passed Final Reading as amended in SD 1 with Representative(s) Fontaine, Johanson voting aye with reservations; Representative(s) Ching, Thielen voting no (2) and Representative(s) Marumoto, Nishimoto, Oshiro, Tokioka excused (4).
(H) Transmitted to Governor.
(S) Received notice of House agreement and passage on Final Reading (Hse. Com. No. 666).
